in.omdev.nsdhelper

Class NsdHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • in.omdev.nsdhelper.NsdHelper

  • public class NsdHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    This class abstracts operations performed by NsdManager like registering and discovering local network services.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  NsdHelper.NsdErrorListener
      Callback interface which is invoked to indicate an error in NsdHelper operations.
      static interface  NsdHelper.ResolveListener
      Callback interface which is invoked when a service is resolved using resolve(NsdServiceInfo serviceInfo).
      static interface  NsdHelper.ServiceListener
      Callback interface which is invoked when a local service is found or lost after calling discover(String deviceType).

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int ERROR_TYPE_REGISTRATION_FAILED
      Error type passed in NsdHelper.NsdErrorListener indicates that service registration failed using register(NsdServiceInfo serviceInfo).
      static int ERROR_TYPE_START_DISCOVERY_FAILED
      Error type passed in NsdHelper.NsdErrorListener indicates that starting service discovery failed using discover(String serviceType).
      static int ERROR_TYPE_STOP_DISCOVERY_FAILED
      Error type passed in NsdHelper.NsdErrorListener indicates that stopping service discovery failed using stopDiscovery().
      static int ERROR_TYPE_UNREGISTRATION_FAILED
      Error type passed in NsdHelper.NsdErrorListener indicates that service unregistration failed using unregister().
      static java.lang.String TAG

    • Constructor Detail

      • NsdHelper

        public NsdHelper(android.app.Activity activity)
        Initialize NsdHelper.
        Parameters:
        activity - used to get NsdManager. Callbacks of NsdHelper will be called using Activity.runOnUiThread(Runnable callback)

    • Method Detail

      • getErrorMessage

        public static java.lang.String getErrorMessage(int errorCode)
        Gets error message corresponding to errorCode passed in NsdHelper.NsdErrorListener.onError(int errorType, int errorCode)
        Parameters:
        errorCode - can be either of NsdManager.FAILURE_ALREADY_ACTIVE, NsdManager.FAILURE_INTERNAL_ERROR and NsdManager.FAILURE_MAX_LIMIT
        Returns:
        Error message

      • setErrorListener

        public void setErrorListener(NsdHelper.NsdErrorListener errorListener)
        Sets listener to be invoked when an error occurs in any of the NsdHelper operations
        Parameters:
        errorListener - listener to be invoked when any error occurs.

      • setExcludeOwnService

        public void setExcludeOwnService(boolean excludeOwnService)
        Call this method before calling discover(String serviceType) to exclude own service which might have been registered using register(NsdServiceInfo serviceInfo)
        Parameters:
        excludeOwnService - set true to exclude own service. Default is false.

      • setServiceListener

        public void setServiceListener(NsdHelper.ServiceListener serviceListener)
        Sets listener to be called when a new service is found or an already found service is lost. Set this before calling discover(String serviceType)
        Parameters:
        serviceListener - listener to be called.

      • setResolveListener

        public void setResolveListener(NsdHelper.ResolveListener resolveListener)
        Sets listener to be called when a service is resolved using resolve(NsdServiceInfo serviceInfo)
        Parameters:
        resolveListener - listener to be called

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Gets name of the own service registered using register(NsdServiceInfo serviceInfo). This name might be different than the name set using NsdServiceInfo.setServiceName(String s) to avoid conflict. Normally this name is used to filter out own registered service which can be automatically done using setExcludeOwnService(boolean exclude)
        Returns:
        name of the registered service

      • getServices

        public java.util.ArrayList<android.net.nsd.NsdServiceInfo> getServices()
        Get a cloned list of active services found using discover(String serviceType). If any service is lost, it will not be removed from the returned cloned list. Thus, to get the updated list, you will have to call this method again.
        Returns:
        cloned list of services found using discover(String serviceType).

      • register

        public void register(android.net.nsd.NsdServiceInfo serviceInfo)
        Register a dns-sd service. If any service is already registered, it will be unregistered before registering new service. This service will be visible to any device connected in local network.
        Parameters:
        serviceInfo - NsdServiceInfo object which contains connection type and the service name.

      • unregister

        public void unregister()
        Unregister the service registered using register(NsdServiceInfo serviceInfo). Calling this method have no effect is no service is registered.

      • discover

        public void discover(java.lang.String serviceType)
        Discover services in local network. If discovery is already started, this method will stop discovery, clear the service list and start discovery again. Register callback NsdHelper.ServiceListener before calling this method to get notified of found and lost services. Call getServices() to get a list of active services found using this method.
        Parameters:
        serviceType - service type to discover in the local network. e.g "_myService._tcp"

      • stopDiscovery

        public void stopDiscovery()
        Stop the service discovery started using discover(String srviceType). Calling this method will have no effect if discovery is not already started.

      • resolve

        public void resolve(android.net.nsd.NsdServiceInfo serviceInfo)
        Resolve a service found using discover(String deviceType). A found service needs to be resolved to get its details like port number and and attributes.
        Parameters:
        serviceInfo - passed in NsdHelper.ServiceListener.onServiceFound(NsdServiceInfo serviceInfo). Can be found in a list returned be getServices().
